opinion.posture:
From Industrial Board of Indiana.
Proceeding under the Workmen's Compensation Act by James P. Fisher against John Hughes. From the award made, the former appealed. Affirmed. By the court in banc.
opinion.attorneys:
Silverburg, Bracken Gray and Earl G. DeFur, for appellant.
Bagot, Free Bagot and James H. Edwards, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed, on authority of Buckley v. Inland Steel Co. (1921), 75 Ind. App. 84, 129 N.E. 860.
